channel.name: Arirang World KR
channel.title: VOICES OF APEC: KOREA 2025
channel.desc: The 2025 APEC Summit, the first large-scale international event hosted under Korea?s new administration, will be accompanied by various high-level meetings and cultural events held in Seoul, Incheon, Jeju, and Gyeongju. These on-site stories will engage both domestic and international audiences, raising interest and expectations for APEC 2025 KOREA.Through the themes of people, places, food, and culture, the preparations for the APEC Summit will be showcased, delivering the message that this event goes beyond a leaders? meeting to become a festival blending global and regional economies, culture, and science.In addition, it will highlight Korea?s status, role, and cultural influence within the diverse global agendas discussed at the high-level and leaders? meetings, reaffirming its significance on the international stage.
